item.description: Update Traffic - FATALITIES; INC#1584; 08:37PM; 1753 N Avalon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SoeKHA; Wilmington; Patient update: Sadly both patients (one in the auto fire and one trapped in 2nd vehicle) were determined dead on scene. Age / gender unknown at this time. All media queries are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 4153 and LA County Coroner Office for the investigation. No further details.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E85 HR3 RA101 T38 T85; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1584; 08:16PM; 1753 N Avalon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SoeKHA; Wilmington; Firefighters arrived to find a traffic collision with auto fire out (no fire upon arrival). One person determined deceased on scene and one person requiring extrication (from which vehicles is unknown at this time). No further patient information available. An extrication operation is underway. Any questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 4153; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E85 HR3 RA101 T38 T85; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

Grass Fire; INC#1250; 05:13PM; 10420 W Northvale Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DIWVyZ; Cheviot Hills; Three engines are handling a grass fire at the rail road tracks. The Expo line is shut down and CHP will be closing the WB 10 Overland off ramp. Follow the appropriate agencies for further traffic updates. No injuries reported and no structures threatened. No further updates are anticipated.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; E43 E58 E62; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic - FATALITY; INC#0288; 07:27AM; Eb 105 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oxg0JN; Vermont Vista; Patient update: One patient was trapped between vehicles (not inside) and is being transported in critical condition. One patient (inside vehicle) determined deceased on scene. 5 additional patients were evaluated and only one will be transported with minor injuries. No ages/genders available. Any further questions are referred to CHP Log 431 for the investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC4 E264 E266 E57 E64 E65 E79 EM1 EM13 EM4 EM5 HR3 RA14 RA15 RA264 RA266 RA46 RA64 RA79 RA866 RA95 T64 T66; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#0288; 06:58AM; EB 105 FY x Harbor FY; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xI3pKo; Broadway-Manchester; Eight vehicle collision with initial reports of one person determined deceased on scene (age/gender unknown) and one person trapped requiring extrication. Three additional patients are being evaluated. CHP Log # 431; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC4 E264 E57 E64 E65 E79 EM13 HR3 RA264 RA64 T64; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: CONTROLLED Major Emergency Brush Fire #LandFire 09/21/2022 INC#0837

item.description: CONTROLLED Major Emergency Brush Fire #LandFire; INC#0837; 05:10PM; 10018 N Sunland Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y4NiXR; #ShadowHills; All forward progress has been stopped, but there are still active hot spots near the perimeter that firefighters are working to fully extinguish, while also improving containment lines. Hose lines are 75% around the fire and hand-cut lines around 100% (but need improvement). Official containment stands at 40%. The terrain is steep and is a 3/4-mile hike to get to the fires edge. This will be an extended operation to achieve full containment and mop up. This fire burned in the footprint of the #LaTunaFire from 2017 (which burned 7,194 acres). We want to thank the 4 assisting agencies in responding quickly with us to hit this fire hard and fast, keeping it away from homes and large animals, which are common in this area. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 AR7 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 BP109 BP74 BP78 CM40 CM42 DZ12 E1 E10 E11 E2 E24 E274 E289 E290 E39 E42 E60 E76 E77 E8136 E8138 E8139 E8140 E82C E90 E91 EA1 EA2 EM14 H0B H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 HE1 HL3 HL4 HT3 PB98 PI1 RA102 RA7 RA77 RA90 RA98 RI600 T74 T89 T90 WT77 WT88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire 09/21/2022 INC#0837

item.description: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#0837; 03:45PM; 10018 N Sunland Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y4NiXR; #ShadowHills; Updated acreage: The fire is now at 107 acres. ANF, LACoFD, Glendale FD, and Burbank FD are assisting. No homes threatened. No injuries. No evacuations. Wind remains light. MEDIA: PIO Captain Erik Scott is en route with an ETA of 4:20. Media staging at LAFD Fire Station 77 on Sunland Blvd north of La Tuna Cyn.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 AR7 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 BP109 BP74 BP78 CM40 CM42 DZ12 E1 E10 E11 E2 E24 E274 E289 E290 E39 E42 E60 E76 E77 E8136 E8138 E8139 E8140 E82C E90 E91 EA1 EA2 EM14 H0B H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 HE1 HT3 PB98 RA102 RA7 RA77 RA90 RA98 RI600 T74 T89 T90 WT77 WT88; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 E18 E275 E287 E7 E87 RA87 T75 T87 T98; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange
